meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring between divisions.
meanings.sent1: The interdivisional meeting brought together teams from different departments.
meanings.sent2: The interdivisional project required collaboration between various sections of the company.
meanings.sent3: The interdivisional potluck showcased dishes from each department.
meanings.sent4: The interdivisional bridge connected the two sides of the campus.
meanings.sent5: The interdivisional soccer tournament promoted unity among the different groups.

meanings.definition: Involving or connecting different divisions within an organization.
meanings.sent1: Her interdivisional role required her to work with multiple departments.
meanings.sent2: The interdivisional communication channels improved coordination between branches.
meanings.sent3: The interdivisional scavenger hunt was a fun team-building activity.
meanings.sent4: The interdivisional relationships formed during the project were valuable.
meanings.sent5: The interdivisional training program enhanced cross-departmental skills.
